DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to assess the acute effects of increasing doses of pinitol on glucose tolerance and insulin sensitivity and to evaluate the absorption of pinitol after consumption of an oral nutritive pinitol-enriched beverage in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Different Doses of Pinitol on Carbohydrate Metabolism Parameters in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criteria for all subjects were age range of 1865 years, body mass index of 2030 Kg/m2 and clinically normal kidney function, liver function, heart function, protein status and haematological profile.
